title: Smugglers V (Latest With 1.4B Patch +  Guild DLC) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here "Smugglers V" with the "Smugglers Guild" DLC. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.


---------------


Smugglers V (1.4 And 1.4B Patch Notes)


- Balance change: You can now trade with pirate hideouts in systems 
owned by another faction with which your faction is at war 

- Balance change: Special event skills (like "Security" when your shipÃ‚Â´s 
computer is infected with a virus) now only require 1 AP to be used. 
This has a big effect on the combat special events and makes combat in 
these cases going a lot smoother. 

- Bug fixed: The description of the advanced target system has been 
corrected. 

- Bug fixed: Fixes a loop in the planet exploration stories that could 
happen if you tried to exit the game. 

- Bug fixed: Typos 

- Bug fixed: The title of a tier in the storyline Smugglers Guild has 
been shortened to fit the window title. 

- Bug fixed: Under certain circumstances there was an endless loop in 
chapter 4 of the Smugglers Guild story. 

- Bug fixed: There was a bug in the Smugglers Guild storyline where 
under certain circumstances the game crashed trying to create an 
encounter with a Syndicate treasure ship (the Syndicate does not own any). 

- Bug fixed: Sometimes it happened that the enemy ship successfully fled 
during story missions, which resulted in the combat being repeated with 
the enemy having shields back at full strength. 

- Bug fixed: When the enemy used a mine there was a graphical glitch 
(white background) around the mine picture. 


-----------------------

Smugglers V "Smugglers Guild DLC Info

What's cool about it:
- Dynamic and multiple-pathed background stories

- Includes the story "The Smugglers Guild"

- Includes the story "Thirst For Vengeance"

- Includes the story "SolomonÃ‚Â´s Treasure"


Overview:
Smuggler's Guild is a compilation of background stories for Smugglers 5 and is named after the first of the three stories.

The first story, "The Smuggler's Guild", starts with the retirement of your trader father through ill health. There's no money in being an honest trader these days. Smuggling contraband is a risky business, but the rewards are great - especially for those lucky or connected enough to join the exclusive Smugglers Guild.

The second story, "Thirst For Vengeance", recalls the pirate raiders that killed your parents and kidnapped your sister when you were a child. As a graduate of the space academy with a ship of your own, the time has finally come to seek your revenge.

In the final story, "SolomonÃ‚Â´s Treasure", your father dedicated his life to finding the hidden treasure of Solomon McTavish, legendary pirate, and died without success. Perhaps you can do better - but you are not the only one seeking this vast fortune.
